Now that you mention it was a 13 year old it makes sense that they would do something like this. Its understandable but if it were to be an adult, well... Adults spending their time on this sort of thing? I didn't know the age of the person but as I mentioned before now it makes more sense. Only a child would spend their time on that sort of thing. But if it gets your jollies, who am I to criticize?
Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote:
--- Phil <ptourigny@...> wrote:

>    I have a theory that the excessive use of smilies
> or other tags to 
> denote such things is slowly (or perhaps
> not-so-slowly) eroding the 
> average netizen's ability to recognise them in their
> pure form...

13 year old or not, court activity or not, the author
is very adept at parody.
